book.synopsis: Former-cop-turned-kennel owner Jack Field and his lover, local medical examiner Dr. Jamie Cutter, come to the aid of Roark, a helpless canine accused of killing a State Supreme Court Justice, found in his car with his throat torn out, as the search out the real culprit with the help of a pack of playful beagles. Original.
